name: The Coalition States (CS) have a standardized army with standard
description: weapons and equipment. Generally, only CS weapons and equipment
raw_snippet: The Coalition States (CS) have a standardized army with standard weapons and equipment. Generally, only CS weapons and equipment are issued to its soldiers. Only wilderness, reconnaissance, and covert Chi-Town operatives are allowed to use weapons other than standard issue. The A study in the corruption of the soul Coalition has the most powerful army in the known world. Their level From the diary of Erin Tarn; Circa 78 P.A. of technology is unsurpassed in the Americas. I fear that I am a firsthand witness to the birthing of a sad new saga of human tyranny. A despot named Karl Prosek sits as the chairman-elect of Chi-Town, but I can see storm clouds rushing swiftly from the horizon. He is the second of the Prosek family to hold the illustrious The recollection seat of chairman-elect. Andâ€¦
